name: Process Lead Engineer (Инженер-технолог)
description:
Обязанности:
  • Participate in reviews and formulation of technical solutions for the Client in part of Technologies, Process Engineering, Design Basis, Scope of Work, Initial Data, Kick-off Meeting
  • Assist clients towards feasible options and manage expectations
  • Analyze Petrochemistry, Gas processing, Water treatment technologies
  • Evaluate and select licensors for the project scopes
  • Perform process configuration and optimization for best practices and innovative solutions which could improve production and quality rates
  • EPFCM, EPC Pre-contract activities, ITB, Preparing estimates and price comparisons (PDP, FEED, PD, Detail engineering Subcontractors), Contract manager work
  • Formulate, check-up and analyze capital expenditures and project designs
  • Schedule and coordinate work to deadlines and within financial budgets
  • Prepare project timely reporting to project management: follow-up the activity, critical deviations of activities and/or potential risks
  • Contribute to get Client’s approval of technical documents
  • Check and monitor Issue quality within the project
  • Manage, review and coordinate Project Design Documentation, Process Documentation, P&IDs, Equipment lists, Piping Systems & Equipment: Sizing & Operation, Datasheets review, U&IO, Gathering & Distribution Systems Design - Flow Assurance
  • Check relief system design, flare hydraulics and radiation
  • Prepare DRC, ADRC, comments to project documentation
  • Participate in 3D model review, safety, environmental and operability reviews (HAZOP, ENVID, SIL)
  • Provide technical Requirements to DCS control System
  • Assist with Client/Licensor/Subcontractor coordination for the startup of completed systems.
  • Provide training program and materials for Process Operators
  • Assist in the development and execution of commissioning and startup plans
  • Assist in achieving Guaranteed Performance of the Process Units
Требования:
  • Master Degree in Process Engineering (Oil & Gas, Petrochemical)
  • At least 5 years experience in Oil&Gas, Petrochemical Industry
  • Strong understanding of process engineering basics (hydraulics, multiphase hydrodynamics, thermodynamics, physical properties, process control). Strong analytical skills
  • Knowledge/experience of process design methods, process calculation (heat and material balances, utility balances, equipment, valves and piping sizing/rating), PFD/PID development
  • Knowledge of international process engineering standards (API, ISA), Russian standards and best process engineering practice
  • Knowledge of special process software (HYSYS) and general engineering software (MS Office, Visio, AutoCAD, Mathcad). Ability to develop simulations using Excel, develop simulation spreadsheets/software, computation methods and applied math.
  • Credible and confident communicator (Written & verbal) at all levels, with excellent presentation skills.
  • Good English-speaking skills (Upper-Intermediate)
Условия:
  • Оформление по ТК РФ
  • Белая ЗП
